authModal.title: Welcome back!
authModal.headerMessage: Log in to have access to our services.
authModal.footerMessage: Click “Sign in” to agree to Mochi's Terms of Service and acknowledge that Mochi's Privacy Policy applies to you.

signup.description: I do not have an account

ageGuard.label: A modal to verify the age of the user

header.intro: Tell us what you want that we deliver to you!
header.plainText: Food, drinks, groceries and many more products available for delivery and pick up in Lisbon and Luanda

enjoy.title: We bring the fun to you!

save.intro: Save big on every order. Join our service of infinite deliveries.
save.description: Infinite deliveries with a monthly fee. Reduced delivery fee on any order. Try this option and cancel anytime.

orders.description: Whatever you want, we get it. Order your delivery with your friends and control the delivery route in real time.

deliver.intro: We deliver drinks, food and a lot more.
deliver.description: Need another charger for your device? Kitchen staples? Party supplies for your friends and you? We’ve everything you need available for delivery within an hour.

start.title: Ready to order?
start.description: Browse local restaurants and stores for delivery by entering your address below.

client.title: Client
client.description: Dear customer if you are unhappy with our services, or customer service, feel free to share with us what went wrong so that we can solve the problem and improve your experience with Mochi.

store.title: Store
store.description: Stores that want to partner with our company, just get in touch with us to start discussing a possible partnership.

candidate.title: Candidate
candidate.description: Candidates who want to be part of the Mochi team, sign up now and we will analyze your resume with great pleasure and satisfaction.

whoWeAre.question: Who we are?
whoWeAre.answer: Founded in 2019, Mochi is a software company focused on helping small and medium businesses to sell their products and services on the internet through our online marketplace. We are a team of young entrepreneurs and programmers specialized in node.js, committed to create an online markeplace for  e-commerce.

marketplace.question: What Mochi Marketplace will be?
marketplace.answer: Mochi's marketplace will be a website where customers can order services and products of small and medium-sized companies from their home. The Mochi marketplace will also support sale of p2p products and services.

organized.question: How will Mochi marketplace organized?
organized.answer: Our marketplace will be organized by Mochi Essentials, independent stores and restaurants.

services.question: What services does Mochi Essentials offer?
services.answer: Mochi Essentials offers convenience products sold by the closest local supermarket from our customers. This service has a fixed delivery fee and a delivery time of less than 30 minutes.

restaurant.question: Which Restaurants our marketplace has?
restaurant.answer: You can find in our marketplace many  restaurants. The delivery fee and area depends of the restaurants decision.

answer.ao: We deliver in Lisbon and Luanda. Check out if there is any store close to you
answer.pt: We deliver in Lisbon and Luanda. Check out if there is any store close to you

cancellation.question: Cancellations?
cancellation.answer: After 1 minute of being requested, we no longer accept cancellations.

answer.ao: Type of payment varies according with country and store.
answer.pt: Type of payment varies according with country and store.

answer.ao: Time of payment varies according with the country and store.
answer.pt: Time of payment varies according with the country and store.

whereOperate.question: Where do we operate?
whereOperate.answer: Our company operates remotely from Lisbon and Luanda.

stage.question: What stage are we in?
stage.answer: Our company is at the start-up phase and it is self-financed by its founders.

employees.question: What kind of employees are we interested in?
employees.answer: Our company is interested in collaborating with creative, pragmatic and passionate professionals in what they do.

values.question: What are our values?
values.answer: Our values ​​are respect, radical transparency at work, friendship and passion for what we love.

needs.question: What we need?
needs.answer: Mochi needs investors interested in financing our project and who believe in our dreams.

customers.question: Who are our customers?
customers.answer: Companies interested in developing their business through e-commerce by making part of our online marketplace.

main.title: Sign in with email
main.headerText: Enter the credentials of your account associated with Mochi, e-mail and password.

main.title: Recover Password
main.headerText: Enter the email associated with your Mochi account. Then you will receive an email with the link to recover your password.

headerText.main: You requested password recovery and were reset to that page.
headerText.one: Enter and confirm your new password
headerText.other: But, unfortunately your token is invalid or has expired, please request a new recovery.
